name: powwow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a meeting of Native Americans for making decisions or for having spiritual ceremonies or celebrations
[ C usually singular ] humorous a meeting in which something important is discussed: My brother's getting divorced so I'm going home for a family powwow this weekend.
